Gem Hunter

Puzzle strategy game on an infinite hex board.

Available onitch.io

Dig

Use blue dots to learn where treasure is buried and red x's to warn where there are mines.

Upgrade

Every night, return to your ship to improve your tools. Choose wisely as you level to make the best use of your gems.

Fix

Find your lost ship parts. Once your ship is fully repaired, you win.

Excel

Achieve great things with careful resource management. How few days will it take for you to find all of the ship parts? How deep can you dig on the first day of a new playthrough?
